sources.title: Bta45465468813
sources.description: Title: "Bonanza" The Abduction Summary: Jennifer Beale is abducted in the hopes her rich father, Joshua, the richest silver baron on the Comstock, will pay a $1M ransom. The plan unravels when the beautiful Della is killed and Hercules, who loves her, finds out who did it. Directed by: Charles F. Haas Actors: Production Company: National Broadcasting Company (NBC) Release Date: Episode aired 29 October 1960 Aspect Ratio: 1.33 : 1 Jennifer Beale is abducted in the hopes her rich father, Joshua, the richest silver baron on the Comstock, will pay a $1M ransom. The plan unravels when the beautiful Della is killed and Hercules, who loves her, finds out who did it.
